dict.acceptation: 当代的，现代的；同时代的，同属一个时期的；
同代人；同辈人；同龄人；当代人；

sent.orig: Compare recent, current, contemporary, modern and new.
sent.trans: 试比较recent、 current、 contemporary、 modern、 new这几个词。

sent.orig: So whether it is a contemporary artwork or fake-contemporary artwork has counted for little.
sent.trans: 所以这是不是一件当代艺术作品或伪当代艺术作品已经无足轻重了。

sent.orig: Contemporary Poetry Quarterly and The World Contemporary Poetry Series have a close fraternal relation.
sent.trans: 本刊与“中外现代诗名家集萃”的各个系列有着兄弟般的血缘关系。

sent.orig: Most contemporary artists in China today use foreign-base art forms to represent contemporary Chinese society.
sent.trans: 大部分中国的当代艺术家用舶来的艺术形式表现当代中国社会。

sent.orig: When the custom compasses is an enterprise, without contemporary company system, also had contemporary company system.
sent.trans: 当家规就是企业的规矩时，没有现代企业制度，也有了现代企业制度。
